cards.title: Additions
points: Added support to modify controls' unique name.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed connector response issue after edit in actionflow.
Fixed issues with concurrent access.
Fixed MSSQL prepared statement connector query preparation.
Fixed GitSync bug with connector in action flow (showing deleted in iterate task).
Fixed minor bugs.

cards.title: Added
points: Added fallback icon for app.
Added multi-region support for Data-dog (External Logger).
Added support for control (Tabbed-container).

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed bug in Sync-license for decrypting task_reset_date.
Fixed user email logging in widgets creation and updation.
Fixed default service name to dynamic in Datadog configuration.
Fixed focusout issue for dropdown property in settings.
Fixed dependency generation in screen header for formula evaluation.

cards.title: Added
points: Added option to switch between multiple data queries without saving.
Added tabs to let you edit multiple data queries parallelly.
Added support for widget in Autogen.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed extra getauditlog call.
Fixed indentation syntax.
Fixed non-stringified null case handling while replacing dynamic variables in query.
Fixed issue where delete option was not visible inside apps under certain conditions.
Fixed continuous loader issue on saving a Connector Library.
Fixed UI for DataQuery to display the trigger data query code with the correct datatype.
